sentences.sContent: And all those everyday consumer products, which owe their existence, in no small part, to manufacturing methods that wouldn’t work without Einstein’s enunciation of the atomic theory of matter.
sentences.sContent_eng: And all those everyday consumer products, which owe their existence, in no small part, to manufacturing methods that wouldn’t work without Einstein’s enunciation of the atomic theory of matter.
sentences.sCn: 还有所有那些日常消费品。 其存在在很大程度上都得归功于那样一些制造方法，没有爱因斯坦对物质的原子理论的阐明，就不会有这些制造方法。
